participant_1.background:
I'm feeling good about my health and my dogs are my best friends.
My most interesting experience was meeting one of my favorite celebrities and getting his autograph when I was growing up in New Hampshire.
i am obsessed with filming.
i always eat my vegetables.
i like to make cookies.

participant_2.background:
I am a stay-at-home mom to my two daughters.
I have a wonderful family and they are always supportive of my music store and my love for Harry Potter.
I'm a powerlifter who loves the cold, but I'm not sure I could be a professional if I were blind
i wait tables.
the only autographs i have ever wanted are from authors.

content.text: Hi there! What do you enjoy doing for fun?
Hey, how's it going? I'm a stay-at-home mom and I love to powerlift.
That sounds awesome! I'm a bit of a foodie and I love to cook and bake.
Do you have any favorite recipes? I'm always looking for new things to try.
I love making cookies, especially chocolate chip!
Those are my favorite! Do you like any other kinds of cookies?
I also like to make snickerdoodles and oatmeal raisin cookies.
I love all kinds of cookies! I'm so glad we're on the same page about that.
Me too! I have a friend who loves to make different kinds of cookies and we always get together to bake them.
That sounds like so much fun! I wish I had a friend like that.
We're always looking for new people to bake with!
I would love to learn how to make some of your favorite recipes
